verses.name: Jeremiah 13:6
verses.text: And it came to pass after many days, that the Lord said unto me, Arise, go to Euphrates, and take the girdle from thence, which I commanded thee to hide there.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:7
verses.text: Then I went to Euphrates, and digged, and took the girdle from the place where I had hid it: and, behold, the girdle was marred, it was profitable for nothing.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:8
verses.text: Then the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:9
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, After this manner will I mar the pride of Judah, and the great pride of Jerusalem.
